Translations.Text: H
My ne vidkryly Quran do vas, shchob vyklykaty vas budʹ-yaki neharazdy
Tilʹky nahadaty shanoblyvyy
vidkryttya z Creator zemli ta vysokykh neba
Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy; Vin prypustyv vesʹ avtorytet
Yomu nalezhytʹ vse u nebi, ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy, ta vse vnyzu zemlya
Chy vy zayavlyayete vashi perekonannya (abo ne) Vin znaye tayemnytsyu, ta shcho ye navitʹ bilʹshe prykhovanyy
BOH: nemaye inshoho boha krim Yoho. Yomu nalezhaty naybilʹshym krasyvym nazvam
vy vidznachyly istoriyu Moses
Koly vin pobachyv vohonʹ, vin skazav yoho rodyni, "Perebuvannyu tut. YA pobachyv vohonʹ. Mozhlyvo ya mozhu prynesty vam deyakym z tse, abo mozhete znayty deyake kerivnytstvo u vohni
Koly vin prybuv yomu, vin buv zaklykanyy, "O, Moses
ya ye vash Lord; usunʹte vashi sandals. Vy ye u svyashchennyy valley, Tuwaa
ya vybrav vas, tak slukhayete shcho vidkryvayetʹsya
ya BOH; nemaye inshoho boha bilya Meni. Vy budete obozhnyuvaty Meni vyklyuchno, ta budete zauvazhyty Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat) shchob zapam'yataty Meni
Hodyna (kinetsʹ svitu) perekonuyetʹsya prybuttya; YA utrymayu tse mayzhe prykhovane, dlya kozhnoyi dushi povynen platytysya za yoho pratsi
Ne budete vidvedenyy zvidty tsymy khto ne viryte v tse - tsey khto peresliduyutʹ yikhni vlasni dumky - lest vy padayete
Yake tse u vashomu pravi ruka, Moses
Vin skazav, "Tse miy personal. YA nakhylyayusya na tse, chereda miy baran z tse, ta ya vykorystovuyu tse dlya inshykh tsiley
Vin skazav, "Kydayutʹ tse vnyz, Moses
Vin kynuv tse vnyz, whereupon tse povernulosya u zvorushlyvoho zmiya
Vin skazav, "Zbyrayutʹ tse; ne zlyakaytesya. My povernemo tse do yoho pokhidnoyi derzhavy
Ta trymayutʹ vashu ruku pid vashym krylom; tse vyyde bile bez plyamy; inshyy dokaz
My takym chynom pokazuyemo vam deyakym z nashoho velykoho portents
Idutʹ Pharaoh, dlya vin porushyv
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, okholodzhuyutʹ miy nastriy
Ta roblyatʹ tsyu materiyu lehku dlya mene
Ta untie vuzol z moho yazyka
Takym "chynom vony mozhutʹ zrozumity moyu promovu
Ta pryznachayutʹ asystenta dlya mene z moyeyi rodyny
Miy brat Aaron
Posylyuyutʹsya meni z nym
Dozvolyayutʹ yomu miy partner u tsiy materiyi
Shcho my mozhemo glorify Vy chasto
Ta svyatkuyete Vas chasto
Vy Seer nas
Vin skazav, "Vashe prokhannya harantuyetʹsya, O Moses
My blahoslovyly vas inshyy raz
Koly my vidkryly do vashoyi materi shcho my vidkryly

Kazhutʹ: `throw yo u korobku, todi kydayutʹ yoho u richku. Richka kyne yoho na bereh, shchob buty zibrana vorohom Shakhty ta voroha yoho.' YA showered vy z kokhannyam z Meni, ta ya mav vy zrobyly pered Moyim watchful okom

Vasha sestra spryamuvala v yikh ta skazala, `i mozhe kazaty vam pro nyanchachu maty shcho mozhe vzyaty harne pikluvannya yoho.' My takym chynom povernuly vam do vashoyi materi, shcho vona mozhe tishytysya ta mozhe zupynytysya pilkuyucha. Ta koly vy ubyly osobu, my vryatuvaly vas z grievous naslidkiv; diysno my vyprobuvaly vas doskonalo. Vy zalyshylysya roky z lyudʹmy Midyan, ta zaraz vy povernulysya z·hidno z akuratnym planom
ya zrobyv vam tilʹky dlya Mene
Idutʹ z vashym bratom, pidtrymanym Moyimy znakamy, ta ne waver u pam'yatayuchykh Meni
Idutʹ Pharaoh, dlya vin porushyv
Rozmovlyayutʹ z yo krasyvo; vin mozhe vzyaty uvahu, abo mozhe staty shanoblyvym
Vony skazaly, "Nash Lord, my bo lest vin mozhe atakuvaty nas, abo mozhe porushyty
Vin skazav, "Ne boyusya, dlya ya budu z vamy, slukhayuchy ta sposterihayuchyy

Idutʹ yomu ta kazhutʹ, `we ye dva kur'yera z vashoho Lorda. Dozvolʹte Dityam Izrayilya idutʹ. Vy povynni utrymatysya vid peresliduyuchykh yim. My prynosymo znak z vashoho Lorda, ta myr yavlyaye soboyu dolyu tsykh khto zvazhayutʹ na kerivnytstvo
we buv nadykhnutyy shcho retribution bude inevitably afflict tsey khto disbelieve ta prohanyayutʹ
Vin skazav, "Khto ye vash Lord, O Moses
Vin skazav, "Nash Lord yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto harantuvav vse yoho isnuvannya, ta yoho kerivnytstvo
Vin skazav, "Shcho pro mynuli heneratsiyi
Vin skazav, znannya tut ye z moyim Lordom u zapysi. Miy Lord nikoly errs, ne Vin zabuvayutʹ
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zrobyv habitable zemli dlya vas, ta paved u tse dorohy dlya vas. Ta Vin posylaye vnyz z vody neba z kotrym my vyroblyayemo bahato riznykh riznovydiv zavodiv
Hostyatʹsya ta pidnimayutʹ vashu domashnu khudobu. Tse - dostatni dokazy dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Z tse my utvoryly vas, u tse my vertayemo vam, ta z tse my prynosymo vam shche raz
My pokazaly yomu vsi nashi dokazy, ale vin disbelieved ta vidmovyvsya
Vin skazav, vy prybuly tut vzyaty nas z nashoyi zemli z vashym zacharuvannyam, O Moses
My bezsumnivno pokazhemo vam podibne zacharuvannya. Tomu, vstanovlyuyemo pryznachennya shcho ni my, ni vy porushyte; u neytralʹnomu mistsi
Vin skazav, "Vash pryznachenyy chas bude denʹ festivities. Dozvolʹte nam vsim zbyrayutʹsya u forenoon
Pharaoh sklykav yoho syly, todi prybuv
Moses skazaly yim, "Prykroshcham do vas. Vy vyhotovlyayete brekhnyu do BOHA boyu ta takym chynom zaznayete Yoho retribution? Taki fabricators bezsumnivno vyydutʹ z ladu
Vony posperechalysya sered sebe, tomu shcho vony prysudyly pryvatno
Vony skazaly, "Tsey dva ni bilʹsh nizh charivnyky kotri ne bazhayutʹ vzyaty vas z vashoyi zemli z yikhnim zacharuvannyam, ta shchob zruynuvaty vash idealʹnyy shlyakh zhyttya
Dozvolyayutʹ nam pohodzhuyutʹsya na odnu skhemu ta oblychchya yim yak z·hurtovanyy front. Peremozhetsʹ sʹohodni bude maty verkhnyu ruku
Vony skazaly, "O Moses, abo vy kydayete, abo my budemo pershi kynuty
Vin skazav, "Vy kydayete." Whereupon, yikhni kanaty ta palky z'yavylysya yomu, vnaslidok yikhnʹoho zacharuvannya, tak, yakby vony rukhalysya
Moses harbored deyakyy strakh
My skazaly, "Ne mayemo strakha. Vy budete perevazhaty
Kydayete shcho vy trymayete u vashomu pravi ruka, ta tse kovtne shcho vony vyhotovyly. Yakyy vyhotovlenyy vony ne ye bilʹsh nizh zamyshlyayuchi charivnyka. Robota charivnyka ne bude maty uspikh
charivnyky upaly prostrate, kazhuchy, "My virymo v Lordu Aaron ta Moses

Vin skazav, vy viryly v yomu bez moho dozvolu? Vin povynen buty vash shef; khto navchyv vas zacharuvannya. YA bezsumnivno roz'yednayu vashi ruky ta nohy na zminnykh storonakh. YA budu crucify vy na korpusakh palʹmy. Vy znaydete kotri nas mozhete zapodiyaty nayhirshyy retribution, ta khto outlasts komu

Vony skazaly, "My ne viddamo perevahu vam nad yasnymy dokazamy shcho prybuly do nas, ta nad khto utvoryv nas. Tomu, pytannya shchob ni vyrok vy bazhayete vydaty. Vy mozhete tilʹky panuvaty u tse nyzʹko dovichnomu
My viryly v nashomu Lordu, shcho Vin mozhe prostyty nas nashi hrikhy, ta mahichni shcho vy prymushuvaly nas vykonaty. BOH daleko krashche ta Everlasting
Budʹ khto khto prybuvaye do yoho Lorda vynuvatoho zaznaye Pekla, prychomu vin nikoly ne vmyraye, ne perebuvannya zhyvi
Yak dlya tsykh khto prybuvaly yomu tomu shcho viruyuchi shcho pryvely spravedlyve zhyttya, vony dosyahayutʹ vysokykh ranhiv
park Eden, vnyzu kotryy richky techiya, bude yikh abode zavzhdy. Takyy yavlyaye soboyu vynahorodu dlya tsykh khto ochyshchayutʹ sebe
My nadykhnuly Moses: "Poveditʹ Moyi sluzhbovtsi, ta straykuyutʹ dlya nykh sukha doroha cherez more. Vy ne budete bo shcho vy mozhete pryyikhaty caught, ne budete vy pilkuyetesya
Pharaoh peresliduvalo yikh z yoho viysʹkom, ale more overwhelmed yim, yak tse destined overwhelm yim
Otzhe, Pharaoh pryzvely do pomylky yoho lyudy; vin ne keruvav nymy
O Dity Izrayilya, my dostavyly vam z vashoho voroha, sklykani vy pravoruch storona Pidiymayetesya Sinai, ta my poslaly vnyz do vas manna ta quails
Hostymosʹ z harnykh rechey my yakshcho dlya vas, ta ne porushuyete, lest vy zaznayete Moho hnivu. Whoever zaznaye Moho hnivu vpav
ya perekonuyusʹ Probachayutʹ dlya tsykh khto kayutʹsya, vvazhayu, vedu spravedlyve zhyttya, ta steadfastly zalyshayusya kerovanyy
Chomu vy kynulysya daleko z vashykh lyudey, O Moses
Vin skazav, "Vony blyzʹki pozadu meni. YA kynuvsya do Vas miy Lord, shcho Vy mozhete buty zadovolʹneni
Vin skazav, "My postavyly vashykh lyudey do testu pislya vas vlivo, ale Samarian pryzvely do pomylky yim

Moses povernulysya do yoho lyudey, serdytykh ta rozcharovanykh, kazhuchy, "O moyi lyudy, vash Lord ne poobitsyav vam harnu obitsyanku? Vy ne mohly zachekaty? Vy zakhotily zaznaty hnivu z vashoho Lorda? Tse chomu vy rozbyly vash dohovir zi mnoyu
Vony skazaly, "My ne rozbyly nash dohovir z vamy na meti. Ale my buly navantazheni vnyz z yuvelirnymy vyrobamy, ta buly vyrisheni shchob kynuty nashi vantazhi. Tse proponuyetʹsya shcho Samarian
Vin vyrobyv dlya nykh sculpted lytka, zavershuyutʹ z lytkoyu zvuk. Vony skazaly, "Tse ye vash boh, ta boh Moses." Otzhe, vin zabuv
vony ne Mohly pobachyty shcho tse ni vidpovidalo yim, ni Mohlo voloditysya budʹ-yakoyu potuzhnistyu do nykh shkody, abo yim vyhody
Ta Aaron kazaly yim, "O moyi lyudy, tse ye test dlya vas. Vash tilʹky Lord yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy, tak slidkuyutʹ meni, ta pidkoryayutʹsya moyim komandam
Vony skazaly, "My prodovzhymo obozhnyuvaty tse, do Moses povertayetʹsya
(Moses) skazalo, "O Aaron, shcho tse shcho zavazhalo vam, koly vy pobachyly yikh zablukayetesya
z nastupnykh moyikh zamov? Vy protydiyaly meni
Vin skazav, "O syn moyeyi materi; ne vytashchitʹ meni moyeyu borodoyu ta moyeyu holovoyu. YA zlyakavsya shcho vy mozhete skazaty, `you rozdilyly Ditey Izrayilya, ta ne pidkoryalysya moyim zamovam
Vin skazav, "U chomu sprava z vamy, O Samarian

Vin skazav, "ya pobachyv yaki vony ne mohly pobachyty. YA skhopyv fistful (pylu) z mistsya de kur'yer lyshyvsya v syli, ta vykorystav tse (shchob zmishatysya u zolotystu lytku). Tse shcho miy rozum nadykhav meni shchob zrobyty

Vin skazav, "Todi idutʹ, ta, vsyudy vashe zhyttya, ne navitʹ prybuvayutʹ zakryvayutʹ. Vy mayete pryznachenyy chas (dlya vashoho zaklyuchnoho vyroku) shcho vy mozhete nikoly ne unyknuty. Podyvitʹsya na vashoho boha shcho vy zvychayno obozhnyuvaly; my spalymo tse ta kydayemo tse u more, shchob zalyshytysya vnyz tam zavzhdy
Vash tilʹky boh BOH; poruch z komu nemaye inshoho boha. Yoho znannya okhoplyuye vsi rechi
My takym chynom rozpovidayemo do vas deyaka novyna z mynulykh heneratsiy. My vidkryly do vas povidomlennya z nas
Tsey khto disregard tse rodytʹ vantazh (hrikhiv) na Dni Resurrection
Vichno vony perebuyutʹ tam; shcho neshchasnyy vantazh na Dni Resurrection
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly rih duyetʹsya, ta my sklykayemo vynuvatyy na shcho denʹ syniy
Shepochutʹ sered sebe, vony skazhutʹ, "Vy zalyshylysya (u pershomu zhytti) ni bilʹsh nizh desyatʹ dniv
My znayemo tsilkom yikhni vyslovy. Naybilʹsh tochnyy sered nykh skazhete, "Vy ne zalyshylysya bilʹsh nizh denʹ
Vony prosyatʹ vas pro hory. Skazhitʹ, "Miy Lord vyt yikh
Vin lyshytʹ yikh lyublyatʹ bezplidnu, kvartyru zemlya
Ne navitʹ naybilʹsh lehkyy pahorb bude vy dyvytesʹ tam, ne opuskayetesya
Na shcho denʹ, kozhnyy proslidkuye caller, bez naybilʹsh lehkoho vidkhylennya. Vsi zvuky budutʹ zaspokoyuvatysya pered naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvym; vy nichoho ne pochuyete ale shepit
Na shcho denʹ, zastupnytstvo bude daremne, krim dlya tsykh dozvolenoho naybilʹshym Dobrozychlyvyy, ta chyyi vyslovy prystosovuyutʹsya do Yoho budutʹ
Vin znaye yikhnye mynule ta yikhnye maybutnye, v toy chas, yak nikhto ne okhoplyuye Yoho znannya
Vsi oblychchya pidkoryatʹsya do Zhyvyy, Vichnyy, ta tsey khto burdened yikhnimy porushennyam vyyde z ladu
Yak dlya tsykh khto popratsyuvaly righteousness, toy chas, yak viryachy, vony budutʹ ne maty strakha nespravedlyvosti abo neshchastya
My takym chynom vidkryly tse, arabsʹke Quran, ta my protsytuvaly u tse vsi riznovydy prorotstva, shcho vony mozhutʹ buty vryatovani, abo tse mozhe vyklykaty yikh vzyaty uvahu
Naybilʹsh Exalted BOH, yedynyy virnyy Korolʹ. Ne kynitʹsya u vymovlyayuchyy Quran pered tym, yak tse vidkryvayetʹsya do vas, ta kazhete, "Miy Lord, zbilʹshuyete moye znannya
My vyprobuvaly Adam ranishe, ale vin zabuv, ta my znayshly yoho indecisive
Vidklykannya shcho my skazaly anhelam, "Padayemo prostrate pered Adam." Vony upaly prostrate, krim Satan; vin vidmovyvsya
My todi skazaly, "O Adam, tse ye voroh vas ta vashoyi druzhyny. Ne dozvolʹte yomu evict vy z Rayu, lest vy stayete neshchasnym
Vy harantuyetesʹ nikoly do holodu tam, ne ne idete nezakhyshcheni
Ne budete vy spraha tam, ne strazhdayete z budʹ-yakoho tepla
Ale chort proshepotiv yomu, kazhuchy, "O Adam, dozvolenyy meni pokaz vy derevo vichnosti ta unending tsaryuvannya
Vony hostylysya z tse, whereupon yikhni orhanizatsiyi staly pomitnym yim, ta vony postaralysya nakryty sebe z lystamy Rayu. Adam takym chynom ne pidkoryavsya yoho Lordu, ta vpav
Z·hodom, yoho Lord vybrav yoho, vykuplenoho yoho, ta kerovanoho yoho

Vin skazav, "Znyzhayetesya zvidty, vsi vy. Vy vorohy odyn odnym. Koly kerivnytstvo prybuvaye do vas z Meni, budʹ khto khto sliduye za Moyim kerivnytstvom ne zablukayetʹsya, ne zaznayete budʹ-yakoho neshchastya
Yak dlya khto disregards Moye povidomlennya, vin bude maty amiserable zhyttya, ta my resurrect yo, na Dni Resurrection, slipoho
Vin skazhe, "Miy Lord, chomu vy sklykaly meni slipyy, koly ya zvychayno buv seer
Vin skazhe, 'Tomu, "shcho vy zabuly nashi vidkryttya koly vony prybuly do vas, vy zaraz zabuvayetesʹ
My takym chynom requite tsey khto porushuyutʹ ta vidmovlyayemosʹ viryty v apokalipsysu yikhnʹoho Lorda. retribution u U maybutnʹomu daleko hirshyy ta everlasting
tse kolysʹ traplyayetʹsya yim skilʹky poperednikh heneratsiy my vynyshchyly? Vony zaraz zakhodyatʹ domivky tsykh pered tym, yak yim. Tse - znaky dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Yakshcho b tse bulo ne dlya vashoho Lorda predetermined plan, vony by sudylysʹ nehayno

Tomu, patsiyent pered yikhnimy vyslovamy, ta pokhvala ta glorify vash Lord pered skhodom sontsya ta pered zakhodom sontsya. Ta pid chas nochi glorify Yo, tak zhe, yak i u obydva kintsyakh dnya, shcho vy mozhete tishytysya

Ta ne covet shcho my podaruvaly budʹ-yakykh inshykh lyudey. Takyy tymchasovi ornamenty tse zhyttya, tym samym my stavymo yikh do testu. Shcho vash Lord zabezpechuye dlya vy daleko krashche, ta everlasting

Vy budete nakazaty vashu rodynu zauvazhyty kontaktni molytvy (Salat), ta steadfastly persevere pry tsʹomu. My ne prosymo vas dlya budʹ-yakykh umov; my yavlyayemo soboyu khto zabezpechuyemo dlya vas. Ostatochnyy triumf nalezhytʹ spravedlyvyy
Vony skazaly, "Yakshcho vin mih tilʹky pokazaty nam chudo z yoho Lorda!" Vony ne otrymaly dostatni dyva z poperednimy povidomlennyamy
Maly my vynyshchyly yikh pered tse, vony by skazaly, "Nash Lord, mav Vy poslaly kur'yeru do nas, my by proslidkuvaly za Vashymy vidkryttyamy, ta by unyknuly tsʹoho soromu ta prynyzhennya
Kazhutʹ, "Vesʹ nas chekayutʹ, tak chekayutʹ; vy bezsumnivno znaydete khto ye na pravylʹnomu shlyakhu, ta khto spravdi keruyetesʹ
